name: Wayne Gretzky and the NHLPA All-Stars
name_original: Wayne Gretzky and the NHLPA All-Stars
description:
Wayne Gretzky and the NHLPA All-Stars is a sports game developed by Sculptured Software, Atari Games and Time Warner Interactive. It came out on 01-11-1995. It was published by Time Warner Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Wayne Gretzky and the NHLPA All-Stars is available on SNES, Genesis and PC.
